title: A samayamuna kEmi
sahitya:
A samayamunakEmi daralOcana sEvitivi O manasA

anupallavi

I samayamuna nuNTE impu sompu jUci vAsavuDE nAkusarikADani yuNTE

caraNam

Ori Ori duSTa jIvuDA yanucu ughramaina ghOSamutO pilucucu 
ghOra rUpamuga yamuDu bhaTulatO gUDi vacci eduTa nilici vEgamE
 rAyanucu baTTi gaTTi goTTucu krUruDai himsalanu jEyu vELa 
Ori varada venkaTEshayani oka sAraina biluvalEka bOtivi
